import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import "./Menucart.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Menudisplay({data}) { useEffect(()=>{ window.localStorage.setItem("gamestorage").J }) return (

{data.title}

Platform : {data.platform}
Description :
{data.short_description}
Release-Data : {data.release_date}
) } export default Menudisplay
